name: History of Space
description:
History of Space is an entertaining and educational experience that appeals to space enthusiasts, history buffs, and gamers alike. It provides an opportunity to explore the history of space exploration in an interactive and engaging manner, fostering a deeper appreciation for the achievements and advancements that have propelled humanity into space. Dive into this fascinating virtual museum and relive the adventures of space history!

Museum Exploration:
Players enter the virtual space history museum and can move freely within it. They can visit exhibition rooms and interact with 3D models of spacecraft while utilizing interactive displays.

Apollo:
Players can visit the Luna exhibition room and experience the story of the famous Apollo 11 mission. They have the opportunity to virtually land on the moon's surface.

International Space Station:
The ISS exhibition offers the chance to explore the space station.
